scripts.postcompile:rust:wasm:release: find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/release/deps/ -type f -name "*.wasm" | xargs -I {} cp {} src/pi_est_wasm/; find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/release/ -type f ! -name "*.asm.js" -name "*.js" | xargs -I {} cp {} src/pi_est_wasm/
scripts.compile:coffeescript:web: npm run compile:coffeescript -- -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header false ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV browser_debug ] -o target/web/bundle.js
scripts.compile:coffeescript:node: npm run compile:coffeescript -- -t [ coffeeify --bare true --header false ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV node_debug ] -o target/node/bundle.js
scripts.clean:
git clean -xdfn; read -n1 -r -p "
press ctrl+c to stop" key; git clean -xdf; printf "
done!
"
